description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. 100% satisfaction is guaranteed. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy on-the-go learning app for Depression. The app helps you understand the basics in a nice and organized manner. Features include tutorials, quizzes, and more.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.

App tools include search feature.



Includes following tutorials:

Depression,
Atypical Depression,
Psychotic Depression,
Dysthymia,
Bipolar Disorder,
Bipolar Disorder I,
Bipolar Disorder II,
Rapid Cycling and Mixed Bipolar Disorder,
Cyclothymia Disorder,
Postpartum Depression,
Major Depression,
Depression Treatment.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Bipolar Disorder,
Quiz on Depression.



Disclaimer for WAGmob Medical apps:

1) The information in this app is for education purposes only.

2) Please do not take any action based on content of this app.

3) Always consult with your qualified health care provider before embarking on a new treatment, diet or fitness program.

4) Please read detailed legal disclaimer before continuing with this app.



What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for a lifetime of on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A simple ‘n easy WAGmob app in every hand.

Please write to us Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
